attributes.action: Reverse & Scrap the Police, Crime, Sentencing and Courts Bill
attributes.additional_details: When this bill is passed then there is no turning back we head into an era of complete and utter totalitarianism and this is a dark future for Great Britain as a whole
attributes.background: Reverse & Scrap the Police, Crime, Sentencing and Courts Bill. So that this bill never ever comes up again to hinder the civil liberties and rights of the citizens

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Do not pass the Police, Crime, Sentencing and Courts Bill: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579242

Do not restrict our rights to peaceful protest: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579012

Remove single person protest clauses in Police, Crime, Sentencing & Courts Bill: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578875
